channel.title: Adding Super Admin Super Hiden Admin and Donator status
channel.description: so hey guys im using delta and i need to add a super admin donator and super hiden admin for people so can someone help me out with that? im using delta thx

item.title: Adding Super Admin Super Hiden Admin and Donator status
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Just make diffrent Player rights level, look in player.java for moderator (it will look something like if p.Rights == 1 (“moderator”)) or something. Just copy what it is, and do like If p.Rights ==4 (“Super Admin”)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Super Admin Super Hiden Admin and Donator status
